review: There a probably thousands of reviews about AppleTV out there, so I am not sure if I can provide much more information.  I had the first model, as well.  I like this one so much better due to the inclusion of NetFlix and other streaming services.  The much smaller size is nice, too.  I actually keep ours behind (under) our television so you barely even see it, other than the small LED light.  Apple products are just so user friendly.
author: Andy

review: I recently purchased the latest generation of Apple TV (gen 3). My decision was based on the review of both products that CNET.COM did back on August 16, 2012. Check out this video review. The setup and interface between the Apple TV and my router/modem was simplistic Like most Apple products, the quality of the hardware and the ease of use helped make my choice.The only reason I did not rate the Apple TV 5 stars is that the product is lacking applications. Both the Apple TV and Roku both have Netflix, However, the Apple TV does not have Amazon Prime Video which Roku does. I hope Apple will add this application to their menu in the near future.If you are looking for a streaming video box that is easy to use, quick in its response time, and small in its hardware design, then I would recommend this product.
author: Sonar77
